attributes.action: investigate the 'bullying tactics' employed by debt recovery agencies and to create clear and forceful legislation to prevent these agencies from operating.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Debt Recovery Agencies (DRA) are using illegal and bullying practices to demand money from vulnerable people by using intimidation, threats and force.  The Credit Services Agency list certain regulations that must be adhered to, however, these are being consistently violated. Extortionate interest charges are being applied to accounts - accounts that cannot even be verified.  The British consumer needs your help to prevent these companies from profiting from such unlawful and immoral activities.
